title: "The system has failed us": Alton Sterling's family on AG's decision
text:
"The system has failed us": Alton Sterling's family on AG's decision 1:03am IST - 01:51 
Quinyetta McMillon, the mother of Alton Sterling's eldest son, was furious after Louisiana Attorney General said the state will not charge the two police officers involved in the fatal 2016 shooting of Sterling, because evidence showed they acted properly. Rough Cut
